title: trailered towards Bath/Bristol on the M4

posts.content:
Seen yesterday evening on the M4 towards Bath/bristol a 11 window trailered. There was a make shift number plate above the front VW emblem: P651AAP. I remember the last 3 letters because it means monkey in Dutch Looked like an encouraging project. Hope it will come out nice.

All the best with it and hopefully we will see it completed soon.

Gertjan
